description: cylindrical form; flat cover with low-relief designs of large leaves and flowers surrounding a plain medallion with concentric circles and very light inscription; body decorated with similar designs above feet and flanking handle; three feet in the form of crowned lions with their front paws resting on balls; similar lion at top above handle; handle decorated with row of stud-like protrusions
marks:
Inscription and Marks

on top in medallion, engr
title: Covered tankard
